data.title: Did you know this famous quote from Contact was written by Ann Druyan? Ann worked with Carl Sagan on many projects including the original...
data.meta_description:
2,117 likes, 15 comments - carlsagandotcom on December 4, 2020: "Did you know this famous quote from Contact was written by Ann Druyan? 

Ann worked with Carl Sagan on many projects including the original COSMOS from 1980. She brought us COSMOS: A SpaceTime Odyssey in 2014 and in 2020 a new book and season was released, COSMOS: Possible Worlds. @cosmosontv 

We are so lucky to still have Ann giving us hope for a better future during a time when we need it most.

If you havenâ€™t read the sequel to COSMOS, make sure to follow and click the link in bio @druyanism 

#CarlSagan #AnnDruyan #COSMOS #Contact".
